title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integrations with the local LLM server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs to interact with local LLMs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing developers to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models within LangChain chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama, inspired by ChatGPT interface, supporting chat history, model management, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client for Ollama, providing a fluent API to integrate local LLMs into JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with idiomatic Ruby methods.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line tool for Ollama with interactive chat, prompt templates, and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for local code completion in VS Code.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama, allowing users to chat with local LLMs directly in Discord channels.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight framework for building autonomous agents powered by Ollama models with tool-use capabilities.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that brings Ollama models into Slack workspaces via socket-mode for secure corporate deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-distro
summary: Community-curated list of unofficial Ollama builds for ARM, RISC-V, and Alpine Linux distributions.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies and extends Ollama API with authentication, rate limiting, and usage analytics.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that connects to Ollama, featuring model switching, parameter sliders, and conversation export.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models and tokio streaming.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama deployments with CUDA and ROCm acceleration overlays.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both HTTP and gRPC transports.
